messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] glad we're unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/16/2001 10:36:09 PM !!!First Boot!!!, carenkh@aol.com ... No wonder so much time it spent on discipline problems.  How many of us would
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/16/2001 10:36:09 PM !!!First Boot!!!, carenkh@...
writes:


> IF IT'S ANYTHING LESS THAN IMMEDIATE OBEDIENCE, IT'S DISOBEDIENCE
>

No wonder so much time it spent on "discipline problems." How many of us
would pass this test??

Nance



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: glad we're unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: I worked at the polls on election day in a nearby public elementary school.  Posted in the teacher s lounge was this sign: IF IT S ANYTHING LESS THAN IMMEDIATE
messages.messageBody:
I worked at the polls on election day in a nearby public elementary
school. Posted in the teacher's lounge was this sign:

IF IT'S ANYTHING LESS THAN IMMEDIATE OBEDIENCE, IT'S DISOBEDIENCE

Goddess forbid the kids taking a moment to ponder, or question...but,
of course, I guess in this particular elementary school, to question
was, well, out of the question. Grateful we're here, grateful I
followed my gut to unschooling...

Caren
